content:
Create a Case Comment Quick Action

To let your agents create case comments, create a Case Comments quick action and add it to the case page layout.

Available in: Lightning Experience, Enterprise, Essentials, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer Editions

User permissions needed:

Manage Cases
Customize Application

In Lightning Experience, select Create a Record for Action Type. Select Case Comment for Target Object. Enter Case Comment for Label.

Click Save to create the action.

To add the quick action to the case page layout, go to Case Page Layouts and edit your case layout. Drag the new quick action to the Salesforce Mobile and Lightning Experience Actions section and click Save.

When agents click the action from the Service Console, they see:

* Body field (always required)
* Public field (available if Experience Cloud sites are enabled)

TIP: Add the Case Comments related list to the case page in the Lightning App Builder to allow agents to create case comments directly from the related list.
title: Setting Up Case Comments in Service Cloud
